QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Scarlet Halls
QuestData.Description: King Anduin Wrynn has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to the Scarlet Halls, northeast of the Undercity, immediately!$B$BCrusader activity has picked up throughout the plaguelands and elsewhere. His majesty fears a revival is underway. Scarlet zealotry will not be tolerated near the King's lands!$b$bEnter the Scarlet Halls and assault the armory and library before they can mobilize.
